description:
Development isn't just for professionals, it's for learners, tinkerers, and activists, too. Using tools that are more approachable not only empowers a broader group of people, it also improves the potential for working teams.

In this talk, we'll cover ways to lower the barrier to entry and overhead of maintenance on projects of all shapes and sizes. We'll talk tools, some of which you might take for grantedâ€”like spreadsheets, and ideas, sharing examples in action, that you can use in your projects at work and on weekends.

Recorded at JAMstack Conf 2018 in San Francisco. Learn about upcoming dates and locations at https://www.jamstackconf.com
Presented by Netlify. Learn more at https://www.netlify.com
title: Jessica Lord - Everyone is a Developer
